title: Login and Dashboard Access
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully and see the consolidated KPIs dashboard with campaign and spend metrics including alerts.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid user credentials.
Submit the login form.
Check that the user is redirected to the KPIs dashboard.
Verify that key campaign metrics and spend data are displayed.
Confirm that alerts related to traffic performance are visible.

title: Campaign Listing and Filtering
description: Verify that the Campaigns section lists campaigns, supports filtering by various criteria, and displays detailed views correctly.

steps.description: From dashboard, navigate to the Campaigns section.
Verify that campaigns are displayed in a list or grid.
Apply filters such as date range, campaign status, and spend thresholds.
Verify that the campaign list updates correctly based on filter criteria.
Click on a campaign to open its detailed view.
Verify detailed campaign metrics including spend, conversions, revenue, and KPIs.

title: Creative Management Listings and Grouping
description: Ensure creatives can be accessed in multiple listing views and grouped by variants or other attributes for performance analysis.

steps.description: Navigate to the Creatives module.
Verify creatives are displayed in default listing view.
Switch between different listing views (e.g., grouped, variant listings).
Confirm that grouping options correctly organize creatives and update displayed data.
Verify performance and engagement metrics are shown for each creative and group.

title: Report Generation, Export, and AI Insights
description: Validate that users can generate filterable reports for selected time ranges and campaigns, receive AI-generated insights, and export the data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Reports page.
Select campaigns and set a time range for the report.
Generate the report.
Verify that filtered report data matches selection criteria.
Confirm AI-generated insights are displayed and appear contextually relevant to the data.
Export the report in available formats (e.g., CSV, PDF).
Verify exported file content matches displayed report.

title: Integrations Setup and Monitoring
description: Test configuration of Meta Ads, Google Ads and GA4 integrations, status monitoring, and troubleshooting.

steps.description: Go to the Integrations management page.
Configure a new Meta Ads integration with valid credentials and parameters.
Verify integration saves successfully and shows active status.
Repeat integration setup for Google Ads and GA4.
Navigate to status monitoring for integrations.
Check that connection status and last sync times are displayed correctly.
Trigger troubleshooting scripts for an integration with known issues.
Confirm troubleshooting outputs are displayed and appropriate error messages appear for failure cases.

title: Automated Data Synchronization Cron Jobs
description: Verify that scheduled synchronization scripts (hourly, daily, weekly) execute successfully and update data integrity without unhandled errors.

steps.description: Trigger the hourly cron job manually or wait for scheduled execution.
Check logs or monitoring to ensure synchronization completed without errors.
Repeat for daily and weekly sync cron jobs.
Verify data in the database reflects updated campaign and spend metrics after sync.
Validate that KPI calculation views are refreshed accordingly.

title: Budget Overview and Calendar Event Alignment
description: Confirm that budgets are correctly displayed over selected periods and calendar events reflect campaign schedules and milestones.

steps.description: Open the Budget Planning dashboard.
Verify spend tracking charts update correctly for selected date ranges.
Navigate to the Operational Calendar page.
Check that events related to campaigns and budget milestones are visible and accurate.
Add a new calendar event related to a campaign milestone.
Ensure the new event appears immediately and maintains correct details.

title: Action Center Task Reminders and Recommendations
description: Validate that the centralized Action Center shows relevant pending tasks, reminders, and recommended actions based on data anomalies or workflow states.

steps.description: Navigate to the Action Center page.
Confirm that pending actions associated with campaigns or budgets are listed.
Verify that recommendations provided are contextually related to detected anomalies or pending workflows.
Mark an action as completed or dismiss a recommendation.
Ensure the Action Center updates accordingly and removed items no longer show.

title: KPI Calculation Accuracy and Display Validation
description: Test that all KPIs displayed in dashboards and campaign/creative views are calculated accurately using valid data and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Fetch campaign and creative data with known values.
Calculate expected KPI values manually or via trusted calculation method.
Compare displayed KPI values on dashboard and detailed views against expected calculations.
Confirm consistency of KPI values between different views and over updated data after sync.

title: Error Handling for Failed Integration Sync
description: Verify that system handles integration sync failures gracefully, showing appropriate error messages and does not impact overall application stability.

steps.description: Simulate integration sync failure (e.g., invalid credentials or network failure).
Check that the system displays clear and actionable error messages to the user.
Ensure that other parts of the application remain functional and responsive.
Verify that retry mechanisms or troubleshooting options are available and work correctly.

title: UI Responsiveness and Feedback
description: Check that UI components across pages provide consistent and responsive behavior including loading states, toasts, and error feedback.

steps.description: Navigate through major pages including dashboard, campaigns, creatives, reports, and integrations.
Verify that loading spinners or skeletons appear during data fetch.
Trigger success and error notifications (toasts) for user actions like save, export, or failed requests.
Ensure all toasts display correct messages and disappear automatically or upon user dismissal.
Test UI responsiveness on various viewport sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

title: Security Controls and Secret Management
description: Validate that secret management, encryption of sensitive data, and audit logging are enforced correctly for integrations and API endpoints.

steps.description: Attempt to access integration configuration endpoints without authentication.
Verify that unauthorized access is denied with appropriate error message.
Check that secrets such as API keys and tokens are stored encrypted in configuration storage or vault.
Trigger actions that modify sensitive configurations and verify audit logs capture these changes.
Confirm that decrypted secrets are never exposed in API responses or client logs.

title: Performance and Loading Time under Load
description: Ensure that system meets responsiveness standards under realistic data loads and concurrent users, verifying caching and server response efficiency.

steps.description: Load dashboards and reports pages with large volumes of campaign and spend data.
Measure page load times and verify they meet performance criteria.
Perform multiple concurrent API requests simulating users fetching campaign and KPI data.
Check for server stability, no timeouts or errors, and verify caching mechanisms reduce redundant load.
Confirm UI remains responsive during data-heavy operations.
